text: Rubén Álvarez Serrano (born June 19, 1975 in Barcelona) is a T42 track and field athlete from Spain. He has a disability: he is missing part of one of his arms or legs. He jumped at the 1992 Summer Paralympics. He was not one of the best races. He jumped at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. He finished third in the triple jump. He finished first in the long jump. He jumped at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. He finished third in the triple jump. == References == Category:Living people Category:1962 births Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Barcelona Category:1992 Summer Paralympics Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T42 Category:Spanish triple jumpers Category:Spanish long jumpers
title: Ruben Alvarez Serrano
